alert.note: Alert for Central Douglas County; Eastern Curry County and Josephine County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 7:45PM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...An area of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Curry, southwestern Douglas, north central Josephine and southeastern Coos Counties through 815 PM PDT... At 745 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms 8 miles northwest of Glendale, or 28 miles south of Roseburg, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Myrtle Creek, Canyonville, Riddle, Glendale, Bear Camp Viewpoint, I 5 At Canyon Creek Pass, Tri-City and Azalea. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Douglas County; Eastern Curry County and Josephine County
